price: 115. À Allah appartiennent l’Est et l’Ouest. Où que vous vous tourniez, là se trouve la Face d’Allah. Car Allah est Immense et Il est Omniscient.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ ٱلۡمَشۡرِقُ وَٱلۡمَغۡرِبُۚ فَأَيۡنَمَا تُوَلُّواْ فَثَمَّ وَجۡهُ ٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ وَٰسِعٌ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walillahi al-mashriqu wal-maghribu fa-aynamā tuwallū fathamma wajhu al-lahi inna al-laha wāsiʿun ʿalīmun
